comments.author: Medicwine
comments.body:
I would just like to reassure everybody's faith in humanity. 

I make pizza at a local mom and pop place. I make sure there's a topping on every bite. If it's just peperroni you'll always get a pep per bite. If you order a 4 topping pizza, I can't guauruntee each topping will be in each bite, but if you add hot peppers you'll get one every bite.
